name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Workbreak: Explore, Track, Reduces Stress & Burnout

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prioritise your mental wellness with WorkBreak. Designed for remote workers and office professionals to reduces stress & burnout.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ðŸš€ Early Access Notice:
WorkBreak is currently in Early Access! We're actively developing and enhancing the app, and some features and health trackers are not yet available or are not 100% build.Please expect bugs but know we are working on theme. Your feedback is invaluable in helping us improve and grow. Stay tuned for exciting updates!

ðŸ¦¾ Current Trackers
1. Hydration
2. Calories
3. ScreenTime

Take charge of your mental and physical wellness with WorkBreak, the ultimate companion for desk workers. Whether you're working from home or the office, WorkBreak helps you maintain a healthy work-life balance by tracking health stats and offering actionable tips to improve your well-being.

âœ¨ Features to Keep You Thriving:
Health Tracking: Monitor your activity levels and take breaks when you need them most.
Personalised Reminders: Get timely nudges to stretch, hydrate, or step away from your screen.
Customisation Options: Tailor notifications to your schedule and preferences.

ðŸ’¼ Designed for Busy Professionals
Work smarter, not harder. WorkBreak keeps your productivity and health in balance, helping you avoid burnout while staying on top of your game.
